DOC.brief_summary: To assess efficacy safety RAD001 ( everolimus ) non-clear cell renal cell carcinoma
DOC.brief_title: RAD001 Non-clear Cell Renal Cell Carcinoma ( RCC )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Histologically cytologically confirm nonclear cell renal cell carcinoma ( papillary , chromophobe , collect duct , oncocytic subtype , sarcomatoid mainly ) 2 . Subjects metastatic legion 3 . Subjects age 18 year old 4 . Subjects whose ECOG performance status 0 1 5 . Subjects laboratory value ; Hematology Neutrophil > = 1.5 x 109/L Platelet > = 75 x 109/L Hemoglobin > = 9 g/dL Liver function test Total bilirubin ≤ 1.5 xULN AST , ALT ≤ 2.5 xULN Alkaline phosphatase ≤ 2.5 xULN Renal function test Creatinine clearance > = 30 mL/min 6 . Subjects understand provide write informed consent 1 . Subjects administer mTOR inhibitor 2 . Pregnant nursing woman , woman childbearing potential must use appropriate contraception study period result pregnancy test perform within 14 day enrollment must negative 3 . Subjects participate clinical study use study medication within 30 day randomization 4 . Subjects clinically uncontrolled central nervous system ( CNS ) metastasis 5 . Subjects life expectancy le 3 month 6 . Subjects interstitial pulmonary disease 7 . Subjects whose QTc interval prolong ( QTc > 450 msec male > 470 msec female ) 8 . Other serious disease medical condition Heart disease unstable despite treatment History myocardial infarction within six month study History serious neurological psychological disorder include dementia seizure Active peptic ulcer control drug
DOC.keyword: Metastatic , non-clear cell , renal cell carcinoma
